results.description: Tunisia's Ellyes Skhiri signs for German side Cologne on a four-year deal from French club Montpellier.
results.title: Tunisia's Ellyes Skhiri leaves Montpellier for Cologne

results.description: Huddersfield Town complete the permanent signing of Belgian midfielder Isaac Mbenza from French club Montpellier.
results.title: Isaac Mbenza: Montpellier midfielder joins Huddersfield Town permanently

results.description: Senegal's Souleymane Camara extends his deal with French side Montpellier to a 13th season with the club.
results.shortTitle: Camara set for 13th season at Montpellier
results.title: Senegal's Souleymane Camara extends Montpellier deal again

results.description: Kylian Mbappe reaches 20 league goals in a season for the first time by scoring in PSG's 5-1 victory over Montpellier.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe scores as PSG thrash Montpellier
results.title: Paris St-Germain 5-1 Montpellier: Kylian Mbappe scores in PSG victory

thumbnail.altText: Kylian Mbappe and Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting

results.description: Huddersfield sign Belgium Under-21 international winger Isaac Mbenza from Ligue 1 side Montpellier on a season-long loan deal.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield sign winger Mbenza on loan
results.title: Isaac Mbenza: Huddersfield sign winger on transfer deadline day

results.description: Edinson Cavani scores to become Paris St-Germain's all-time top scorer and help the Ligue 1 leaders cruise past Montpellier.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 4-0 Montpellier

thumbnail.altText: Paris St-Germain striker Edinson Cavani celebrates becoming the club's all-time record goalscorer

results.description: Monaco are denied top spot in Ligue 1 as Montpellier score a stoppage-time equaliser.
results.title: Monaco 1-1 Montpellier

results.description: Paris St-Germain drop points in Ligue 1 for the first time this season as they miss the injured Neymar in a draw with Montpellier.
results.title: Montpellier 0-0 Paris St-Germain

results.description: Paris St-Germain go top of Ligue 1 with victory over Montpellier, although they have now played two games more than Monaco.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 2-0 Montpellier

results.description: Paris St-Germain miss the chance to go top of Ligue 1 after they suffer a surprise home defeat by Montpellier.
results.title: Montpellier 3-0 Paris St-Germain

results.description: Montpellier defender Mathieu Deplagne appeals for help after losing a tooth on the pitch in his side's victory over Marseille.
results.title: Montpellier 3-1 Marseille

results.description: Former West Bromwich Albion and Sunderland midfielder Stephane Sessegnon signs for Montpellier on a two-year contract.
results.title: Stephane Sessegnon: Montpellier sign ex-West Brom midfielder

results.description: Blaise Matuidi's goal ensures Paris St-Germain maintain their 100% start to the season with a win at Montpellier.
results.title: Montpellier 0-1 Paris St-Germain
